articles.content: The guys over at ComputerBase put together one of the most exhaustive reviews for the RX 6800/XT cards on the Net. This is among the few sites that tested the undervolting potential of the new AMD ca… [+1780 chars]

articles.author: Joanna Nelius
articles.title: It's Time to Embrace Cloud Gaming, Especially GeForce Now - Gizmodo
articles.description: Cloud gaming is finally available on every major platform, and while Stadia and xCloud, and even Luna, have gotten a lot of press, its GeForce Now I keep coming back to.
articles.content: GeForce Now is on iOS. Luna is on iOS. Stadia and xCloud are coming to iOS in the not too distant future. Ideally, this would have been through a stand-alone app and not the Safari browser, but hey, … [+5848 chars]
